title: Reno Acupuncture & Integrative Medicine
description: We incorporate time honored traditions of Acupuncture and Herbal Medicine with modern science-based Nutrition, Supplementation, and Lab Analysis.
cleaned_text: Caring for the whole person with Acupuncture & Integrative Medicine. Activate your body's natural ability to heal itself. We use a combination of traditional eastern modalities informed by modern science to help restore your health and vitality. We offer comprehensive and effective treatments for chronic pain, sports injuries, digestive disorders, allergies, cold & flu, common children's health issues, fertility, OBGYN and much more. [About](http://www.renoacu.com/what-we-offer/) Interested in Acupuncture and Integrative Medicine? Find out about our medicinal approach, services offered, background and experience. [Contact Us](http://www.renoacu.com/appointments) Ready to take the next step? Find out how we can assist your health goals with a complementary initial phone consultation.
